name: EGO GENESIS: REBORN
description:
The game is still in development / pre-alpha build.

EGO GENESIS-REBORN is an action- adventure video game with light RPG elements and is available on PC & Mac OS X.   The game takes place in the medieval time period in a fictional empire known as Vanglieon.  Players play as both Ashen & Quinn, Ashen is the mercenary and Quinn, his alter ego.  Ashen will be given a task by a friend from the Prince of Vanglieon to eradicate and destroy all the Chibos from Vanglieon. Chibos are little powerful creatures / demons that will feed and prey on fear of people and even Ashen himself.  Quinn will help Ashen to overcome his hurdles in life and claim the ultimate price from the Prince.
